content: Why is this "Democrats out to take your guns," stuff still making the rounds when the most restrictive gun control legislation proposed right now is coming from 5 Republicans, and it is the Democrats who pigeon holed it? The only thing that is happening right now is that the Chicken Littles have started panic buying and driven the price of firearms through the roof, and the availability of ammunition and reloading supplies to critical low levels... And, the Dems don't have anything to do with it... I bought this IWI Desert Baby Eagle II last month for just over $575 including sales tax. Shot about 250 rounds through it so far. Most accurate .45 acp out of the box I have ever shot...including a Colt Goldcup Match.
